description: This is the latest edition of this iconic blackcrows ski that first appeared in 2014. This truly is the everyday big mountain ski, accessible and versatile, for skiers who want a ski that excels in powder but also displays impeccable behaviour in all conditions. The Atris is always to the point, and aims at delighting the heart of the most demanding.
name: Atris Skis 2023/24 - Mens
